p: Following emergence of pandemic influenza A (H1N1) 2009 in North America in spring 2009 ( 1, 2), global spread of the virus was rapid ( 3, 4). In the United Kingdom, the first confirmed cases were detected in travelers returning from Mexico ( 5). The United Kingdom implemented a containment strategy until July 2009 that involved rapid case ascertainment, early treatment with antiviral drugs (AVs), and postexposure prophylaxis of patientsâ€™ close contacts.
